message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning) as it introduces a solution that combines universal value functions and hindsight learning to improve sample efficiency in RL algorithms. It also mentions that the approach significantly accelerates learning in a variety of tasks, which is a common focus of research in the machine learning community. 

Additionally, the paper involves the use of automated learning of policies at different time scales, which could also fall under the sub-categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.RO (Robotics). The use of hindsight learning could also relate to the sub-category of cs.SY (Systems and Control). Finally, the paper mentions the use of the approach in both discrete and continuous tasks, which could relate to the sub-category of cs.CV (Computer Vision) in the case of continuous tasks involving visual input.
